text: Santana do Paraíso is a Brazilian city in the Vale do Aço metropolitan area, state of Minas Gerais. Its population in 2009 was 24.695 inhabitants. Its area is 275,529 km². The city was founded in April 28, 1992. It is limited with the municipal districts of Belo Oriente, Mesquita, Ipatinga, Caratinga e Ipaba == Other websites == * Official site of Santana do Paraíso Category:Cities in Minas Gerais Category:Vale do Aço metropolitan area Category:1992 establishments Category:1990s establishments in Brazil
title: Santana do Paraíso
